heading.paymentMethod: How would you like to receive your payment?

subHeading.ach: Faster, easier, & more convenient. Control the account at your own convenience.
subHeading.paypal: Payment will be released to your PayPal account. It will take less than an hour for the payment to appear.
subHeading.zelle: Quick, secure, and easy way to receive money. No need to share your confidential bank information.
subHeading.check: Allow 10-15 business days for your check to arrive to your registered address.
subHeading.directDeposit: Payment will be released to the account linked to your 16-digit Debit Card or preloadable prepaid card. It will take less than an hour for the payment to appear in your bank account.
subHeading.instantConnection: Sign in to your bank to securely connect your account. The fastest way to get set up for digital payment
subHeading.manualConnection: If your bank does not support instant connection, you can manually enter the routing number and your personal account number

tooltipText.paypal: PayPal threshold limit is ${{threshold}}. Any of your future payments which exceed Network Processing limit will not be processed.
tooltipText.directDeposit: Instant Pay threshold limit is ${{threshold}}. Any of your future payments which exceed Network Processing limit will not be processed.
tooltipText.zelle: Zelle threshold limit is ${{threshold}}. Any of your future payments which exceed Network Processing limit will not be processed.

info.document: The document set forth below is the Cardholder agreement for the U.S. Bank rewards Card.
info.Agreement: US Bank Corporate Rewards Cardholder Agreement
info.Card: What will my card look like?
info.DigitalDisclosure: Upon review and approval, your order will be processed and shipped out within 7-10 business days. For questions please call Customer Service: 855-274-9934. For updating your details once submitted here, please visit https://usbankrewardscard.com/. Rewards Card cannot be reloaded with additional funds, nor can it be used at an ATM. No cash access. For use in the U.S. only. Terms and conditions, including fees, apply. Rewards Card is issued by U.S. Bank National Association pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. ©2021 U.S. Bank.
info.PlasticDisclosure: Upon review and approval, your order will be processed and shipped out within 7-10 business days. For questions please call Customer Service: 855-274-9934. For updating your details once submitted here, please visit https://usbankrewardscard.com/. Rewards Card cannot be reloaded with additional funds, nor can it be used at an ATM. No cash access. For use in the U.S. only.Terms and conditions, including fees, apply. Rewards Card is issued by U.S. Bank National Association pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A.Inc. © 2021 U.S.Bank.

info.document: The document set forth below are thePre-Acquisition Disclosure and the Fee Schedule.
info.acknowledgement: Please review the document for acknowledgement.
info.acknowledge: I acknowledge review of this document
info.Card: What will my card look like?
info.Disclosure: Digital Card Disclosure - Upon review and approval, your order will be processed and emailed out within 3 business days. For questions please call Customer Service: 877-528-6413. For updating your details once submitted here, please visit https://rewards.mydigitalcard.com/. Digital Rewards Card will be fulfilled via a digital card that can be used for online purchases only. Digital Rewards Card cannot be reloaded with additional funds, nor can it be used at an ATM. No cash access. May be used in U.S. Bank only. Card expires 12 months after issuance. Other terms and conditions apply. Digital Rewards Card is issued by U.S. Bank National Association, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A.Inc.

message.confirmationText: You have exceeded the maximum number of incorrect attempts. Please choose another payment preference.
message.logoutConfirmationText: Deposit to Debit Card was unsuccessful. Please choose another payment preference. Click YES to continue.

alternatePayment.heading: Secondary Payment Method (Optional)
alternatePayment.msgText: You can add the Secondary Payment after logging in to the Payment Exchange
alternatePayment.paymentCheck: If you prefer to receive your payment via check.
alternatePayment.subHeading: Choosing a secondary payment method is recommended to ensure the smooth processing of high dollar payments. By selecting a secondary payment method, you will receive your money without delay even if it cannot be processed by your primary payment method due to network processing limits.

ifEnrolled: Less than 1 Hour if Phone number or Email is enrolled with Zelle.

shareAccount: Select an account to share with

registeredUser.ach: An email and / or SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your payment to your bank account within {{timeRequired}} business days. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
registeredUser.check: An email and / or SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your check within {{timeRequired}} business days. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
registeredUser.zelle: An email and / or text message has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your payment in your bank account linked with Zelle usually in less than an hour. It can take up to a day for some banks. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
registeredUser.directDeposit: An email and / or SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your payment in the account linked to your debit card within less than an hour. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
registeredUser.paypal: An email and / or SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your payment in your PayPal account in less than an hour. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
registeredUser.usbankAch: An email and / or SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your payment in your bank account within {{timeRequired}} business days. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
registeredUser.usbankZelle: An email and / or SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your payment in your Zelle account in less than an hour. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
registeredUser.usBankDepositToDebitcard: An email and / or SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your payment in your Deposit to Debit account in less than an hour. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
registeredUser.usBankPrepaidCard: An email and / or SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your payment in your Prepaid Card within {{timeRequired}} business days. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
registeredUser.usBankCHK: An email and / or SMS confirmation has been sent to your contact information on file. You will receive your check within {{timeRequired}} business days. For future payments, you can change your payment preference anytime.
